descriptionHtml:
Ingots meshes from Ingot Texture Pack by Mancer (mancika). Author gives permission for their use: "You may include these files in your mod without asking me first just give credit if you do so".
The idea of the imperial logo on ingots borrowed from same mod. In this meshes returned to the correct path to the texture in silver and iron ingots (the error of the original game).
Textures is photorealistic, on base metal surface photo, marble etc. Resolution 1024x1024 (normal maps too).

In archive two variants: with imperial emblems on the ingots and without emblem. If you wish, you can combine files of both options, for example, leave the logo on only a few ingots.
Installation the standard: put the meshes and textures folder in the Data folder of the game.
author: langley
